universum.studios.android.preference

Interface SharedPreferencesHost

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PreferencesManager

    public interface SharedPreferencesHost
    Interface for simple host which provides access to SharedPreferences for specified name and mode. Instance of the corresponding shared preferences may be obtained via getSharedPreferences().
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SharedPreferences getSharedPreferences()
      Returns the instance of SharedPreferences managed by this host.
      int getSharedPreferencesMode()
      Returns the mode for preferences file specified for this host.
      String getSharedPreferencesName()
      Returns the name for preferences file specified for this host.
      void setSharedPreferencesMode(int mode)
      Sets a mode for preferences file that is used by this host to access instance of SharedPreferences via Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int).
      void setSharedPreferencesName(String name)
      Sets a name for preferences file that is used by this host to access instance of SharedPreferences via Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int).

    • Method Detail

      • setSharedPreferencesName

        void setSharedPreferencesName(@Nullable
                              String name)
        Sets a name for preferences file that is used by this host to access instance of SharedPreferences via Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int).
        Parameters:
        name - The desired preferences name. May be null if this host should use default name provide by the framework.
        See Also:
        getSharedPreferencesName(), setSharedPreferencesMode(int), getSharedPreferences()

      • getSharedPreferencesName

        @NonNull
String getSharedPreferencesName()
        Returns the name for preferences file specified for this host.

        Default value: PreferenceManager#getDefaultSharedPreferencesName(Context)

        Returns:
        Preferences name. If no name has been specified a default one will be returned.
        See Also:
        setSharedPreferencesName(String), getSharedPreferencesMode(), getSharedPreferences()

      • setSharedPreferencesMode

        void setSharedPreferencesMode(int mode)
        Sets a mode for preferences file that is used by this host to access instance of SharedPreferences via Context.getSharedPreferences(String, int).
        Parameters:
        mode - The desired preferences mode.
        See Also:
        getSharedPreferencesMode(), setSharedPreferencesName(String), getSharedPreferences()

      • getSharedPreferencesMode

        int getSharedPreferencesMode()
        Returns the mode for preferences file specified for this host.

        Default value: MODE_PRIVATE

        Returns:
        Preferences mode. If no mode has been specified a default one will be returned.
        See Also:
        setSharedPreferencesMode(int), getSharedPreferencesName(), getSharedPreferences()

      • getSharedPreferences

        @NonNull
SharedPreferences getSharedPreferences()
        Returns the instance of SharedPreferences managed by this host.
        Returns:
        The associated shared preferences.
        See Also:
        setSharedPreferencesName(String), setSharedPreferencesMode(int)
